text: Timothy Mason (born September 16, 1974) is a Canadian bowls player. He was born in Penetanguishene, Ontario. ==Career== Mason found bowls when he moved to West Vancouver. He had played hockey, tennis and golf. He won the Canadian bowls championship twice.https://www.simcoe.com/life/five-questions-for- canadian-lawn-bowling-champion-tim- mason/article_41a60aba-8801-5d8c-a486-c3aff2effbff.html? ==References== Category:Bowls Category:Canadian sportspeople Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Tim Mason
